de.lambeck.pned.elements.data

Class DataNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.elements.data.DataElement
      • de.lambeck.pned.elements.data.DataNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataElement, IDataNode, IElement, INode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataPlace, DataTransition

    public abstract class DataNode
extends DataElement
implements IDataNode
    Superclass DataNode implements the common members for all nodes.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataNode

        public DataNode(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a node with the specified id.

        Note: The GUI will pass an id which is a UUID (as String) if the user has created a node in the GUI. The PNML parser may pass any kind of String.

        Note: The id has no Setter because it should never change after creation.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of this Node
        name - The name of this place

      • getPosition

        public java.awt.Point getPosition()
        Description copied from interface: INode
        Returns the position (center) of this node.

        Note that for the GUI "center" refers to the shape of this node itself (place, transition). It does not include the label.
        Specified by:
        getPosition in interface INode
        Returns:
        The position

      • getAllPredCount

        public int getAllPredCount()
        Description copied from interface: IDataElement
        This method returns the number of predecessors. A node is a root element, if its number of predecessors is 0.
        Specified by:
        getAllPredCount in interface IDataElement
        Returns:
        Number of predecessors

      • getAllSuccCount

        public int getAllSuccCount()
        Description copied from interface: IDataElement
        This method returns the number of successors. A node is an end element, if its number of successors is 0.
        Specified by:
        getAllSuccCount in interface IDataElement
        Returns:

        public java.util.List<IDataArc> getPredElems()
        Description copied from interface: IDataNode
